items.headline: Going back to work after you start claiming Social Security could cost you. Is it worth it?
items.summary_en: If you’re already claiming Social Security, there’s a limit on how much you can earn.

items.headline: Netflix misses big on profit, but remains firm that its growth will continue unabated
items.summary_en: The company blamed a tax dispute in Brazil for dragging down margins, but said the stage is set for big gains in its ad business.

items.headline: Berkshire’s stock presents Buffett with a ‘golden cross’ as his retirement nears
items.summary_en: Shares of Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway have produced a bullish “golden cross” chart pattern, less than three months before the famed investor is set to retire.

items.headline: Meta, Blue Owl and AI: Here are the details of Wall Street’s biggest private-credit deal ever
items.summary_en: Meta and Blue Owl struck a record $27 billion joint venture for the tech giant’s Hyperion data center, signaling a pivot in how Big Tech is funding its AI ambitions.

items.headline: ‘I’m worried about hurt feelings’: I regret hiring my brother-in-law as my financial adviser. How do I fire him?

items.headline: ‘Big Brother is watching how we spend our dollars’: I asked to withdraw money from my bank. The teller started grilling me. Is this normal?
items.summary_en: “We are going on a trip that could include casino visits, but I didn’t want her to know that.”

items.headline: This Blackstone-TPG deal joins over $700 billion worth of private-equity buyouts this year. That’s good news for shareholders.

items.headline: GM’s stock surges to a record high. Why investors are cheering.
items.summary_en: GM doesn’t anticipate tariff costs to be as steep as it previously expected. The automaker is also benefiting from higher prices, and says its move to trim EV production will pay off next year.

items.headline: This 35-year-old is stockpiling $250,000 in nickels as a bet against inflation: ‘This has zero downside’
